stickyNote_0.textbox_text:
Initialisation routine is run once at the start!
In this case, we just create a new global variable.

stickyNote_1.textbox_text:
The scoring routine is run to test if a field-of-view is 'good enough'. In our case, we do some acquisition, we calculate the average image, wait 2 seconds, and then let the Decision widget (right) do its thing.

In this case, it will always pass the test, but you can change this by changing the Decision widget.

stickyNote_2.textbox_text: The acquisition routine is run at every field of view which is termed 'good enough'.

NODES_STICKY_NOTE.stickyNote_0:
Initialisation routine is run once at the start!
In this case, we just create a new global variable.
NODES_STICKY_NOTE.stickyNote_1:
The scoring routine is run to test if a field-of-view is 'good enough'. In our case, we do some acquisition, we calculate the average image, wait 2 seconds, and then let the Decision widget (right) do its thing.

In this case, it will always pass the test, but you can change this by changing the Decision widget.
NODES_STICKY_NOTE.stickyNote_2: The acquisition routine is run at every field of view which is termed 'good enough'.
